name: Space Infection
description:
HISTORY

You wake up after a moment from cryo. Space crew was supposed to wake you up in 5 years old. You don't have any information why electricity is out or why there is a dead crew mate at your left.
You'll find a last crew alive, or maybe not...

TIPS

Better to play with the .exe version, in full screen for immersion.

Every interactable element have a blue light

You can hide yourself in vent and lockers (they also got blue light) 

Control :
ZQSD / WASD - Movement
E - Interact with objectives, vent and lockers
F - Flashlight

Our Github : 
https://github.com/IchiSamaFR
https://github.com/Raphael0010
